notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Norsemen bought or sold real estate in Chicago last week:
Charles W. Hoff to Henry N. Petersen: Price, $8,500.
G. E. Markham to Lillie O. Anderson: Marshfield Avenue, south of 63rd Street. Price, $1,200.
W. E. Robinson to Martin 4415 Troy Street. Price, $1,200.
B. Nilson to Andrew Carraro: Lot 7, Block 33, Grant Locomotive Work Addition. Price, $2,000.
F. A. Britten to Herman C. Peterson: Beland Avenue, west of Leavitt Street, Price, $1,200.
A. Lansing to Robert T. Christiansen: Paulina Street, corner of Waveland Avenue. Price, $2,500.
C. T. and T. Company to Jens Artesian Avenue, south of Sunnyside Avenue. Price, $900.
C. T. and T. Company to : Artesian Avenue, south of Sunnyside Avenue. Price, $1,000.
